sharedRegions

Class ArrivalQuay

  • java.lang.Object
    • sharedRegions.ArrivalQuay
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ATTQBusDriver, ATTQPassenger

    public class ArrivalQuay
extends java.lang.Object
implements ATTQBusDriver, ATTQPassenger
    Implementation of the Arrival Quay Shared Memory The BusDriver waits here for passengers to come so he can drive them to departure terminal.

        Description copied from interface: ATTQBusDriver
        Let's the BusDriver know his shift as ended, so he can enter terminal state.
        Specified by:

        Returns:

      • announcingBusBoarding

        public void announcingBusBoarding()
        Description copied from interface: ATTQBusDriver
        The bus driver waits until there's passengers in the queue or it's time to leave. After this, he notifies all passengers that the bus is ready to board.
        Specified by:
        announcingBusBoarding in interface ATTQBusDriver

      • goToDepartureTerminal

        public void goToDepartureTerminal()
        Description copied from interface: ATTQBusDriver
        After boarding all passengers, the bus driver then drives to the DepartureTerminal. This function changes state to DRIVING_FORWARD and unparks the bus.
        Specified by:
        goToDepartureTerminal in interface ATTQBusDriver

      • parkTheBus

        public void parkTheBus()
        Description copied from interface: ATTQBusDriver
        Parks the bus after returning from Departure Terminal. It assumes the Bus comes back empty from the terminal.
        Specified by:
        parkTheBus in interface ATTQBusDriver

      • enterTheBus

        public void enterTheBus()
        Description copied from interface: ATTQPassenger
        Simulates the entrance of a passenger on the bus. The passenger gets in the queue and waits orders from the BusDriver to board.
        Specified by:
        enterTheBus in interface ATTQPassenger
